Passive.Name: Injured
Passive.Desc: Starts the battle with 50% less HP.

Passive.Name: Splay Their Reds
Passive.Desc: Deal +10% damage and Stagger damage every time this character uses a Combat Page against a target consecutively. (Max. 50%) If damage increase is 30% or higher, all Offensive dice gain '[On Hit] Inflict 1 Bleed next Scene'. If this character uses a Combat Page against a different target, reset the damage increase.

Passive.Name: Shimmering
Passive.Desc: At the start of each Scene, exhaust all pages in hand and deck; add new pages to hand. Their Cost becomes 0.

Passive.Name: Prescript
